alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 08 at 3:54AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds Returning Today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...South to southwest wind between 25 and 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...The Wind River Basin, Southeast Fremont County, Natrona County, including Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Today. The strongest winds are likely between 9 AM and 4 PM. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mainly to transportation, especially on west to east orientated roads. Control issues are likely, especially for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
